General.Name: Shanghai Shibei Hi-Tech Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Shibei Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. develops and operates real estate properties in China. It also engages in the industrial investment incubation and industrial service integration businesses. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Erfang Machinery Co., Ltd. Shanghai Shibei Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.
